thread.title: Montini: Russian hackers said to have dirt on Trump. Think maybe they'll use it?
thread.title_full: Montini: Russian hackers said to have dirt on Trump. Think maybe they'll use it?

title: Montini: Russian hackers said to have dirt on Trump. Think maybe they'll use it?
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Montini: Russian hackers said to have dirt on Trump. Think maybe they'll use it? EJ Montini: So, do you still want to praise the Russians for illegally hacking Democrats? Post to Facebook Montini: Russian hackers said to have dirt on Trump. Think maybe they'll use it? EJ Montini: So, do you still want to praise the Russians for illegally hacking Democrats? Check out this story on azcentral.com: http://azc.cc/2jsXLDJ Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 25 EJ Montini , The Republic | azcentral.com Published 9:28 p.m. MT Jan. 10, 2017 | Updated 10 hours ago 242 Shares x Share The Arizona Republic's Ed Montini explains why Trump should resign following news that Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered an election hack. 
So, do you still want to praise the Russians for illegally hacking into the computers of Democrats and messing with America’s electoral process? 
Still happy that the cyber criminals conducting espionage for Comrade Putin used stolen material to turn voters against Hillary Clinton? 
Still overjoyed that the Russians’ plan worked? 
Still fooling yourself into believing that the outcome of the election was their endgame? 
Because it looks like it might simply have been their first step. 
According to several news reports, Russian hackers also wiggled their way into the personal and financial background of Donald Trump and are in possession of "compromising" information about the man who soon will be president of the United States. 
Do you think, maybe, the Russians might find a sinister use for such information somewhere down the road? 
Yeah, me too. 
So, do you still believe the hacking was NOT an act of war? 
Still believe Trump’s election was a victory rather than a defeat?
